com.jalios.jcms

Class AbstractIndexManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jalios.jcms.AbstractIndexManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccessControlListIndexManager, CategoryIndexManager, DataIndexManager, GroupIndexManager, MemberIndexManager, PublicationIndexManager

    public abstract class AbstractIndexManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class provides generic methods to manage data indices.
    Since:
    jcms-6.0.0
    Author:
    Olivier Dedieu

        protected <K extends Data,T> boolean isUndefinedIndexWithSet(java.util.Map<K,java.util.Set<T>> index,

        Returns true is key is null or if no index (even empty) is stored in the given index.

        index - the index
        key - the key
        Returns:
